original_title: Exporters invited to join Sri Lanka Brands Forum at World Expo in Osaka
original_body_lines: The National Chamber of Exporters of Sri Lanka (NCE), in collaboration with the Embassy of Sri Lanka in Japan, has announced the “Sri Lankan Export Brands Forum”, taking place on 25 September, at the prestigious World Expo in Osaka, Japan.

This event is part of NCE’s broader effort to open new trade gateways and is a significant market access initiative aimed at helping Sri Lankan exporters enter or expand in the Japanese market — one of the most sophisticated and high-value economies in Asia.

Held under the theme “Sri Lankan Export Brands”, the forum will include a Mini Expo and targeted B2B meetings, offering exporters a unique platform to connect directly with Japanese importers, buyers, distributors, and trade intermediaries.

Participating in this event offers Sri Lankan exporters direct access to one of Asia’s most valuable and stable markets. Japan is known for its high demand for quality, ethically sourced products, and this forum provides a focused platform to showcase Sri Lankan offerings to verified Japanese importers, distributors, and trade partners. With curated B2B meetings arranged in collaboration with the Osaka Chamber of Commerce and other sectoral bodies, exporters will have the chance to form meaningful, long-term trade relationships in a business culture that values trust and consistency.

Beyond trade connections, this event offers unmatched brand visibility at a global venue that attracts over 75,000 daily visitors, while also providing key market intelligence on Japanese consumer preferences, pricing models, and regulatory expectations. Participating companies will gain not only commercial leads but also enhanced credibility and positioning in the eyes of international buyers. This is a unique opportunity to elevate your brand and establish a strong foothold in the Japanese market under the prestigious NCE and Embassy platform.

Whether you’re an established exporter or an emerging brand ready to enter the Japanese market, this is a rare and high-impact opportunity to promote your products and services in one of the world’s most lucrative trade environments.
The NCE warmly invites Sri Lankan exporters across all sectors to be part of this important delegation.
